name: Mute Cove
description:
You Were Warned Not To Come here 

Now The Entity Of The Mute Cove Wants To Keep You Here Forever

Make Your Way To Your Bike But Be Warned

The Entity Is Patrolling Around Your Bike

If It Sees You..

You will keep Being Brought Back To The Cursed bench That started 

this whole mess

(Note: Game Will Close When Beaten)

(Note: Depending On Your Pc You May Not Be Able To Run Shadows)

Controls

Arrow Keys Or Wasd Keys: Moves Player

ESC Key: Closes Game

R Key: Restarts Level

Space Key: To Jump

Mouse: Moves Camera
